overview:
Dana Kuhman is an energetic, hard-working professional with functional experience in program development and executive management. She possesses strong organizational skills and the ability to multi-task and prioritize. Dana has excellent written and oral communication skills and possesses the ability to work in both team-oriented and self-directed environments.

In 2000, Ms. Kuhman joined Globalcom, Inc. and most recently served as the Executive Project Director. During her eight years at the Company, her responsibilities included providing direct support to the CEO and managing a communication plan as the liaison to executives and management personnel. Ms. Kuhman worked with executive management and contributed to the development, integration and coordination of company strategic goals and objectives that supported the Companyâ€™s mission and core values. Moreover, she maintained a positive rapport with the Companyâ€™s Board of Directors, high-level customers, vendors and investors.
